name: Groovy Garden
description:
Hello everyone! 

This is Groovy Garden! A game about a gardener sent to a far away planet to grow and sell flowers to the friendly locals! You are the best gardener around, because you have a way with flowers… You know that for your plants to grow faster, you need to… put some music on! Although watch out for what the flowers like and dislike… This game was made in two weeks for a game jam at school with two other amazing developers.

Carl Boisvert  - Programming 

Bryan Internoscia - Level Artist 

Charles-Antoine Solis - Game Designer, Sound Designer and Composer

Fonts that were used in the game are from Iconian Fonts. Thanks for playing and have fun!
